body_html: @apaszke I agree, we should add the dynamic check when converting C++ -> Python. @colesbury : yeah, let's make that check cheap using Ed's modifications. Let's do this in 2 steps: we just modify this PR first to use the expensive check (all the current pybind paths are not perf critical), and then do a follow up PR that replaces with the fast check. This PR is making some JIT pr's harder because I keep forgeting to cast at::Tensors to Variable before sending to pybind.

body: @apaszke I agree, we should add the dynamic check when converting C++ -> Python. @colesbury : yeah, let's make that check cheap using Ed's modifications. Let's do this in 2 steps: we just modify this PR first to use the expensive check (all the current pybind paths are not perf critical), and then do a follow up PR that replaces with the fast check. This PR is making some JIT pr's harder because I keep forgeting to cast at::Tensors to Variable before sending to pybind.
